criteria: Description of the Effects of Internal Influences
Description of the Effects of External Influences
descriptions: Student does not identify any internal influences on food choices and physical activity.
Student identifies one internal influence with limited accuracy.
Student identifies two internal influences with some accuracy.
Student identifies three internal influences with reasonable accuracy.
Student identifies four internal influences with good accuracy and provides basic examples.
Student comprehensively identifies multiple internal influences with excellent accuracy, providing detailed examples and showing a strong understanding of their impact.
Student does not identify any external influences on food choices and physical activity.
Student identifies one external influence with limited accuracy.
Student identifies two external influences with some accuracy.
Student identifies three external influences with reasonable accuracy.
Student identifies four external influences with good accuracy and provides basic examples.
Student comprehensively identifies multiple external influences with excellent accuracy, providing detailed examples and showing a strong understanding of their impact.
Student does not describe the effects of internal influences.
Student attempts to describe the effect of one internal influence, but the description is unclear or inaccurate.
Student describes the effects of one or two internal influences with limited clarity.
Student describes the effects of multiple internal influences with reasonable clarity.
Student clearly describes the effects of multiple internal influences, providing relevant examples.
Student expertly describes the effects of multiple internal influences, providing insightful examples and demonstrating a thorough understanding of the relationships.
Student does not describe the effects of external influences.
Student attempts to describe the effect of one external influence, but the description is unclear or inaccurate.
Student describes the effects of one or two external influences with limited clarity.
Student describes the effects of multiple external influences with reasonable clarity.
Student clearly describes the effects of multiple external influences, providing relevant examples.
Student expertly describes the effects of multiple external influences, providing insightful examples and demonstrating a thorough understanding of the relationships.
